across.question: Be the first to perform (a role)
Do this to put aside vanity
Do this to keep the loved one's divine spark close by
It may be abstract or kinetic
Gardner McKay novel about a lunatic who psychologically tortures his victims
Multicolored museum near the Space Needle
Do this to show that you are struck down by grief
Do this to show you are humbled by your loss
Singer of the 2011 hit "Someone Like You"

down.question: Piece of a piece of glassware
With 40-Down, beverages suitable for summertime sipping
It's rolled out during a rain delay
Mineralogist who developed a hardness scale
An Olympian from here might have rivalries with Olympians from BRA and ARG
